title: braseqtb pipeline parameters
description: A flexible pipeline for complete analysis of bacterial genomes

awsbatch_profile_parameters.title: AWS Batch Profile (-profile awsbatch) Parameters
awsbatch_profile_parameters.description: Parameters to fine-tune your AWS Batch setup.

aws_region.description: AWS Region to be used by Nextflow

aws_queue.description: Name of queue to use for AWS Batch

aws_volumes.description: Volumes to be mounted from the EC2 instance to the Docker container

aws_cli_path.description: Path to the AWS CLI for Nextflow to use.

aws_upload_storage_class.description: The S3 storage slass to use for storing files on S3

aws_max_parallel_transfers.description: The number of parallele transfers between EC2 and S3

aws_delay_between_attempts.description: The duration of sleep (in seconds) between each transfer between EC2 and S3

aws_max_transfer_attempts.description: The maximum number of times to retry transferring a file between EC2 and S3

aws_max_retry.description: The maximum number of times to retry a process on AWS Batch
